name: Cassidy Holloway and the Ghost of Manny Stubbins
name_original: Cassidy Holloway and the Ghost of Manny Stubbins
description:
Entry for Secret Santa Jam 22

CONTROLS
Move - Arrow Keys/WASD
Interact/Jump - Z
Run - X
(If the controls don't seem to work, try clicking inside the game window)

Cassidy Holloway and the Ghost of Manny Stubbins is a short game experience designed with GB Studio. Developed in about three weeks by my little solo-dev self for the Secret Santa Game Jam. My giftee enjoys platformers and games that blend genres and game mechanics. I was inspired by the puzzle, ghost-hunting adventures of Phasmophobia and cute, retro platformers. 

As of the first release (12/23/22) there's only one possible option, but updates may come! There's still a lot on the back end of game development I'm learning, but I hope you enjoy!

Game and art developed by Laurie Noel. Music by Mr. V.

If you experience any bugs please let me know! 

Enjoyed what I made? Say thanks with a ko-fi. I am fueled by caffeine Join me on tumblr for game and pixel updates
